meanings.definition: The position or role of an inspector.
meanings.sent1: In her new job, she was promoted to an inspectorships.
meanings.sent2: The inspectorships required attention to detail and thoroughness.
meanings.sent3: The inspectorships at the zoo had to make sure all the animals were happy and healthy.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his inspectorships made him the backbone of the team.
meanings.sent5: The inspectorships involved regular checks and reports to ensure everything was in order.

meanings.sent1: The inspectorships gathered for their monthly meeting.
meanings.sent2: The inspectorships were responsible for maintaining safety standards.
meanings.sent3: During the inspection, the inspectorships joked about finding hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The inspectorships worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The inspectorships collaborated effectively to cover all areas of expertise.
